All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BackButton
A customised JButton with a back arrow icon.
BackGroundPanel
JPanel that sets the gif as background.
BusinessException
Exception class representing business logic errors.
CustomErrorDialog
A custom dialog box to display error messages.
CustomMessagePopUp
A custom dialog box to display error messages.
CustomYesOrNODialog
A custom dialog box with yes/no options for user interaction.
Game
Represents a game entity.
GameController
Controller class responsible for handling user actions in the game view.
GameManager
Manages the game logic and interaction with the database.
GameView
Class that represents the main view of the game.
Generator
Represents a generator in the game.
HomeController
Controller responsible for managing the actions on the HomeView.
HomeView
Represents the HomeView frame, displaying options for logging in or signing up.
LoginController
Controller responsible for managing the login functionality and views of the application.
LoginManager
Manages login-related operations such as validating user credentials, checking for ongoing games, and handling password recovery.
LoginView
Represents the LoginView frame, allowing users to log in to the system.
LogoCoffeePanel
Helper class to create a panel with a logo image.
Main
The entry point of the application.
MainController
Controller responsible for managing the main functionality and views of the application.
MainControllerEvent
Interface representing events in the main controller.
MainFrame
Represents the main frame of the application, which manages different views using CardLayout.
MySqlDAO
Represents a class for interacting with a MySQL database.
PersistenceException
Custom exception class for persistence-related errors.
PowerUp
Represents a power-up in the game.
RecoverPasswordController
Controller class responsible for handling actions related to password recovery.
RecoverPasswordView
Represents the LoginView frame, allowing users to log in to the system.
ResumeGameController
Controller responsible for handling user actions in the ResumeGameView.
ResumeGameView
Represents the ResumeGameView frame, allowing users to resume an open game.
SignUpController
Controller responsible for handling user actions in the SignUpView.
SignUpManager
The SignUpManager class manages user registration and validation of registration data.
SignUpView
Represents the SignUpView frame, allowing users to register a new account.
SqlConfig
This class provides functionalities to read MySQL configuration from a JSON file.
SqlDAO
This interface defines methods to interact with an SQL database for managing users, games, generators, and power-ups.
StartGameController
Controller responsible for managing interactions and data flow related to starting a new game.
StartGameManager
The StartGameManager class manages the creation of new games and checks for existing games.
StartGameView
Represents the StartGameView frame, which allows users to start a new game.
StatisticsController
Controller responsible for managing interactions and data flow related to statistics view.
StatisticsView
Represents the StatisticsView frame, which displays statistics and graphs based on user and game data.
Strings
Enum representing various strings used in the user interface.
TextStyle
Enum representing various text styles.
Title
Represents a title label with custom styling.
UserButton
Represents a button with a user icon.
UserController
Controller for managing user-related actions.
UserManager
The UserManager class manages user-related operations such as user deletion.
UserView
Represents the UserView frame, which displays the user's profile information and options.
ViewException
The ViewException class provides utility methods for displaying error messages in a graphical user interface using JOptionPane.
ViewStyles
Enum representing various visual styles for frames and buttons.
